ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So neither you nor those you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore you and all what you worship. (The disbelievers and their deities.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, verily you and those whom you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So surely you and what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for you, and that you serve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! verily, ye and that which ye worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: neither you nor what you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore verily neither ye nor that which ye worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed you and what you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For, verily, neither ye nor those ye worship-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, verily you (pagans) and those whom you worship (idols).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But as for you, and that you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely, you and what you serve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:161] For indeed you and what you worship, of idols,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! verily, ye) people of Mecca (and that which ye worship) beside Allah,
